channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Signs Executive Order Targeting New Law Firm, Jenner & Block
item.description: An executive order underscored the extent to which the president, who faced four indictments after he left office, aims to exact a price from anyone a...

item.title: NBA star Steph Curry’s top parenting tip as a father of 4: ‘Learn what they respond to the most’
item.description: “You want to let them know that they each have a superpower and are unique for a reason.”

item.title: U.S. to End Vaccine Funds for Poor Countries
item.description: A 281-page spreadsheet obtained by The Times lists the Trump administration’s plans for thousands of foreign aid programs.

item.title: Rivals Pounce on Paul Weiss, a Top Law Firm, After Trump’s Order
item.description: Fears that competitors could take its top rainmaking talent added to the law firm’s worries about a Trump executive order that targeted it.

item.title: Tesla analyst says CEO Elon Musk is ‘back in charge’ after surprise all-hands meeting, and investors are rewarding the company’s stock
item.description: Tesla stock jumped 12% for its best day since November.

item.title: Supreme Court Upholds Biden Administration’s Limits on ‘Ghost Guns’
item.description: The administration had tightened regulations on kits that can be easily assembled into nearly untraceable firearms.

item.title: More than 9 million student loan borrowers could see a big drop in their credit scores this year
item.description: "This would result in reduced credit limits, higher interest rates for new loans, and overall lower credit access," according to the Federal Reserve.

item.title: Dollar Tree Is Selling Family Dollar for $1 Billion
item.description: Nearly 10 years after buying Family Dollar for about $9 billion, Dollar Tree announced it would sell the retailer to two private equity firms.

item.title: Sudan’s Military Is Driving Rival Fighters Out of Khartoum, a Major Shift in Civil War

item.description: Nearly 10 years after buying Family Dollar for about $9 billion, Dollar Tree announced it would sell the retailer to two private equity firms.

item.title: What is Trump really worth? What we know about his business wealth—from real estate to crypto to Truth Social
item.description: The president is worth at least $4.9 billion, and crypto assets like $TRUMP and World Liberty Financial could add billions more.

item.title: The recession could either speed up or slow down when you get your inheritance—experts say these are the huge deciding factors
item.description: Financial experts say that goals tied to gifting, recession timing, and asset liquidity will all matter in the $84 trillion great wealth transfer.
